function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limitation of mHealth accessibility due to technical dependency and network connectivity","Impact":"Decreased rate of mHealth technology usage and accessibility","Mitigation":"Improving network connectivity and providing technical support to users","Technologies":"Network infrastructure improvements and user-friendly applications","People":"People in areas with poor network connectivity and limited technology access","Owner":"Telecommunication companies and mHealth service providers"},{"Description":"Data security and privacy concerns in managing personal health data online","Impact":"Threat to data by cybercriminals and lack of trust in mHealth technologies","Mitigation":"Implementing strong data security measures and privacy policies","Technologies":"Encryption, secure data storage, and privacy protection tools","People":"Users of mHealth applications and healthcare providers","Owner":"Technology companies and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of accuracy in over-phone contact tracing measurements","Impact":"Inaccuracy in contact tracing and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Developing more accurate distance measurement methods and using alternative contact tracing technologies","Technologies":"GPS technology, Bluetooth proximity detection, and advanced sensor technology","People":"Public health authorities and individuals being traced","Owner":"Health agencies and technology developers"}]}
